dependencies.name: py-blinker

dependencies.description: Various helpers to pass trusted data to untrusted environments.
dependencies.name: py-itsdangerous

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The Swiss Army knife of Python web development
dependencies.name: py-werkzeug

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) is a set of tools and Python
modules for setting up, manipulating, running, visualizing and analyzing
atomistic simulations.
dependent_to.name: py-ase

dependent_to.description:
CANToolz is a framework for analysing CAN networks and devices. It
provides multiple modules that can be chained using CANToolz's pipe
system and used by security researchers, automotive/OEM security testers
in black-box analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-cantoolz

dependent_to.description:
DaCe is a fast parallel programming framework that takes code in
Python/NumPy and other programming languages, and maps it to high-
performance CPU, GPU, and FPGA programs, which can be optimized
programmatically or interactively.
dependent_to.name: py-dace

dependent_to.description: DataLad extension for exposing commands via a web request API
dependent_to.name: py-datalad-webapp

dependent_to.description:
Fava is a web interface for the double-entry bookkeeping software
Beancount with a focus on features and usability.
dependent_to.name: py-fava

dependent_to.description: FireWorks stores, executes, and manages calculation workflows.
dependent_to.name: py-fireworks

dependent_to.description: Implements i18n and l10n support for Flask.
dependent_to.name: py-flask-babel

dependent_to.description:
Flask-Compress allows you to easily compress your Flask application's
responses with gzip.
dependent_to.name: py-flask-compress

dependent_to.description:
A Flask extension for handling Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS),
making cross-origin AJAX possible.
dependent_to.name: py-flask-cors

dependent_to.description:
Simple paginate for flask (study from will_paginate). Use bootstrap css
framework, supports bootstrap2&3 and foundation.
dependent_to.name: py-flask-paginate

dependent_to.description: Simple framework for creating REST APIs
dependent_to.name: py-flask-restful

dependent_to.description:
Flask-SocketIO gives Flask applications access to low latency bi-
directional communications between the clients and the server. The
client-side application can use any of the SocketIO official clients
libraries in Javascript, C++, Java and Swift, or any compatible client
to establish a permanent connection to the server.
dependent_to.name: py-flask-socketio

dependent_to.description: Add SQLAlchemy support to your Flask application.
dependent_to.name: py-flask-sqlalchemy

dependent_to.description: gdbgui is a modern, free, browser-based frontend to gdb
dependent_to.name: py-gdbgui

dependent_to.description: HTTP Request and Response Service
dependent_to.name: py-httpbin

dependent_to.description: MLflow: A Platform for ML Development and Productionization.
dependent_to.name: py-mlflow

dependent_to.description: Simple data dependent workflows in Python
dependent_to.name: py-parsl

dependent_to.description: Prometheus metrics exporter for Flask.
dependent_to.name: py-prometheus-flask-exporter

dependent_to.description: Easily test your HTTP library against a local copy of httpbin
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-httpbin

dependent_to.description: Raven is a client for Sentry.
dependent_to.name: py-raven

dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io
dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk
